activation.en: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

effect.en: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can banish 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your GY to make 1 Dragon Normal Monster you control gain 200 ATK x that banished monster's Level until the end of this turn, also if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
